fields.comment: projectile velocity is multiplied with this value every frame
fields.name: projectile_drag_coeff

fields.comment: fog of war change per frame
fields.name: fog_of_war_delta

fields.comment: probability of fire being extinguished per cell update
fields.name: fire_extinguish_chance

fields.comment: probability of spontaneous freezing reactions per cell reaction update
fields.name: reaction_freeze_chance

fields.comment: probability of spontaneous frozen material melting reactions per cell reaction update
fields.name: reaction_unfreeze_chance

fields.comment: probability of random water stains being added to characters
fields.name: random_water_stains_chance

fields.comment: number of water cells added when adding random water stains
fields.name: random_water_stains_amount

fields.comment: if 1, every static material in this place conduct electricity
fields.name: everything_is_conductive
